definition: brilliant and varied/(often in the combination 精彩纷呈)
to present to a superior/memorial/petition/to present (a certain appearance)/to assume (a shape)/to be (a certain color)

sentences.english: It will be a spectacular show for the holiday season.
sentences.chinese: 這將是一場十分難得的精彩紛呈的彙報演出。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve Wishing Wall in New York.
sentences.chinese: 新年前夜紐約許願牆五彩紛呈。

sentences.english: Among root carvings in various postures, I seem to have walked in a vast forest of arts.
sentences.chinese: 我從姿彩紛呈的根雕中，走進一個莽莽的藝術森林。

sentences.english: A colorful history of coins and currency from their very beginnings.
sentences.chinese: 一部圖文並茂的錢幣史，縱貫古今，精彩紛呈。

sentences.english: THE past year saw many wonderful new books released in the UK and US.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的一年裏，英美湧現出許多精彩紛呈的新書。

sentences.english: The Yuan era brimmed with diverse cultures and religions.
sentences.chinese: 元朝是各種宗教和文化異彩紛呈的時代。

sentences.english: The colorful vegetation of this tropical forest amazed the professor.
sentences.chinese: 這片熱帶森林色彩紛呈的植被使教授驚奇。

sentences.english: Only by so doing will various civilizations in the world blossom with radiant splendor.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，世界文明的百花園才能異彩紛呈。

sentences.english: I don’t need to tell you how wonderful and powerful the internet is.
sentences.chinese: 我無需向你介紹因特網的力量和精彩紛呈。

sentences.english: That's right, tonight our show is so colorful.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯今晚我們可是爲大家準備了很多異彩紛呈的節目。

sentences.english: Modern architecture of wealthyJapan, an economic giant, is more colorful.
sentences.chinese: 經濟大國的日本的現代建築探索更是異彩紛呈。

sentences.english: The game between marriage and sex represents a colorful diversity.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻與性之間的搏弈，呈現出異彩紛呈的多樣性。

sentences.english: The novel world of LiBiHua is wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 李碧華的小說世界是精彩紛呈的。
有記敘性的，精彩紛呈的記敘故事。
